attributes.action: Ban advertising in the uk of animals for products
attributes.additional_details:
Animals are used to promote goods such as cars,loans,beauty products, home insurance, car insurance - anything you can think of.
I want to see a ban in the uk promoting these adverts and hopefully we can stop it world over!
Animals are used in adverts and charities reap the cost with no help from the companies that advertise their products.
No animals should be used to promote products.
Millions of animals are put to sleep every day due to advertising so stop using them to promote products.
